attributes.action: Stop charging NHS Staff for parking at a work place.
attributes.additional_details:
The government website states that "NHS organisations should work with their patients and staff, local authorities and public transport providers to make sure that users can get to the site (and park if necessary) as safely, conveniently and economically as possible."
 However granted this is not always the situation in all cases. Yet Where staff are paid small pitence for there input in to society. This stares in the face of all staff attending and commuting to care and assist.
attributes.background: It is fundamentally ludicrous that staff have to have to pay a parking charge, Either attending a work place or patients on another site. Within the NHS.
